name: UTileSetEditorSettings
doc: Settings for the Paper2D tile set editor

DefaultBackgroundColor: Default background color for new tile set assets
bShowGridByDefault: Should the grid be shown by default when the editor is opened?
ExtrusionAmount: The amount to extrude out from the edge of each tile (in pixels)
bPadToPowerOf2: Should we pad the conditioned texture to the next power of 2?
bFillWithTransparentBlack: Should we use transparent black or white when filling the texture areas that aren't covered by tiles?
